synopsis:
1st year work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director：Kaori RYO
Music : ChikaWATANABE
Sound Design：SachiTAKAHASHI
producer : Mitsuko OKAMOTO

Synopsis：
The things are formed in the mind from the casual scenes of daily life. These imaginations accumulate and make an assembly of fantasy.
